title: I Reincarnated and Tried to Become a Genius Child Actor. I Want to Quit. - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Gender Bender   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Bullying   Child Protagonist   Cute Story   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Loli   Male to Female   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Reincarnation   Showbiz   Wealthy Characters
author: At The Right Of An Indian   Indohito O Migi E   インド人を右へ
description:
I reincarnated, so what do I do?

Because I worked at a black company, I overworked to death. I want to live without working this time. But, in my previous life, I was a very ordinary guy, and I didn’t have any special skills.

At that time, I watched TV and a light bulb flashed.

With the body of a child and the head of an adult, I might be able to aim for a rise as a genius child.

In the future, I will work hard to become a NEET!>
